info.title: Audiobookshelf API
info.description: Audiobookshelf API with autogenerated OpenAPI doc

get.description: Get an author by ID. The author's books and series can be included in the response.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: A comma separated list of what to include with the author. The options are `items` and `series`. `series` will only have an effect if `items` is included. For example, the value `items,series` will include both library items and series.

patch.description: Update an author by ID. The author's name and description can be updated. This endpoint will merge two authors if the new author name matches another author name in the database.

delete.description: Delete an author by ID. This will remove the author from all books.

get.summary: Get an author image by author ID
get.description: Get an author image by author ID. The image will be returned in the requested format and size.

post.summary: Add an author image to the server
post.description: Add an author image to the server. The image will be downloaded from the provided URL and stored on the server.

requestBody.description: The author image to add by URL.

patch.summary: Update an author image by author ID
patch.description: Update an author image by author ID. The image will be resized if the width, height, or format is provided.

delete.summary: Delete an author image by author ID
delete.description: Delete an author image by author ID. This will remove the image from the server and the database.

post.summary: Match the author against Audible using quick match
post.description: Match the author against Audible using quick match. Quick match updates the author's description and image (if no image already existed) with information from audible. Either `asin` or `q` must be provided, with `asin` taking priority if both are provided.

requestBody.description: The author object to match against an online provider.

get.description: Get email settings for sending e-books to e-readers.

post.summary: Create a new library on server
post.description: Create a new library on server.

get.summary: Get a single library by ID on server
get.description: Get a single library by ID on server.

patch.summary: Update a single library by ID on server
patch.description: Update a single library by ID on server.

delete.summary: Delete a single library by ID on server
delete.description: Delete a single library by ID on server and return the deleted object.

get.summary: Get all authors in a library
get.description: Get all authors in a library by ID on server.
Get items in a library by ID on server.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The field to sort by from the request.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: The fields to include in the response. The only current option is `rssfeed`.

parameters.name: collapseSeries
parameters.description: Whether to collapse series into a single cover

delete.summary: Delete items with issues in a library.
delete.description: Delete all items with issues in a library by library ID on the server. This only removes the items from the ABS database and does not delete media files.

get.description: Get series in a library. Filtering and sorting can be applied.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The field to sort by from the request.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: The fields to include in the response. The only current option is `rssfeed`.

get.description: Get a single series in a library by ID on server. This endpoint is deprecated and `/api/series/{id}` should be used instead.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The field to sort by from the request.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: The fields to include in the response. The only current option is `rssfeed`.

get.description: Get all Apprise notification events and notification settings for server.

patch.description: Update the URL, max failed attempts, and maximum notifications that can be queued for Apprise.

get.description: Get all Apprise notification event data for the server.

parameters.name: fail
parameters.description: Whether to intentionally cause the notification to fail. `0` for false, `1` for true.

delete.description: Delete the notification by ID and return the notification settings.

patch.description: Update an individual Notification by ID

get.description: Send a test to the given notification by ID.

rssFeed.description: The RSS feed URL of the podcast

400.description: Bad request, OPML text not provided

post.summary: Bulk create podcasts from OPML feed URLs

200.description: Successfully created podcasts from feed URLs

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of episodes to download

200.description: Successfully checked and downloaded new episodes

parameters.description: Title of the episode to search for

parameters.name: override
parameters.description: Override existing details if set to 1

parameters.name: hard
parameters.description: Hard delete the episode if set to 1

requestBody.description: A comma separated list of what to include with the series.

include.description: A comma separated list of what to include with the series.

authorAsin.description: The Audible identifier (ASIN) of the author. Will be null if unknown. Not the Amazon identifier.

authorDescription.description: The new description of the author.

authorImagePath.description: The absolute path for the author image. This will be in the `metadata/` directory. Will be null if there is no image.

addedAt.description: The time (in ms since POSIX epoch) when added to the server.

updatedAt.description: The time (in ms since POSIX epoch) when last updated.

libraryItemId.description: The ID of library items after 2.3.0.

oldLibraryItemId.description: The ID of library items on server version 2.2.23 and before.

inode.description: The inode of the item in the file system.

mediaType.description: The type of media, will be book or podcast.

path.description: The path of the library item on the server.

relPath.description: The path, relative to the library folder, of the library item.

isFile.description: Whether the library item is a single file in the root of the library folder.

mtimeMs.description: The time (in ms since POSIX epoch) when the library item was last modified on disk.

ctimeMs.description: The time (in ms since POSIX epoch) when the library item status was changed on disk.

birthtimeMs.description: The time (in ms since POSIX epoch) when the library item was created on disk. Will be 0 if unknown.

isMissing.description: Whether the library item was scanned and no longer exists.

isInvalid.description: Whether the library item was scanned and no longer has media files.

bookMetadataBase.description: The base book metadata object for minified, normal, and extended schemas to inherit from.

title.description: The title of the book. Will be null if unknown.

subtitle.description: The subtitle of the book. Will be null if there is no subtitle.

publishedYear.description: The year the book was published. Will be null if unknown.

publishedDate.description: The date the book was published. Will be null if unknown.

publisher.description: The publisher of the book. Will be null if unknown.

description.description: A description for the book. Will be null if empty.
description.example: The masterpiece that started Terry Goodkind's New York Times bestselling epic Sword of Truth In the aftermath of the brutal murder of his father, a mysterious woman, Kahlan Amnell, appears in Richard Cypher's forest sanctuary seeking help...and more. His world, his very beliefs, are shattered when ancient debts come due with thundering violence. In a dark age it takes courage to live, and more than mere courage to challenge those who hold dominion, Richard and Kahlan must take up that challenge or become the next victims. Beyond awaits a bewitching land where even the best of their hearts could betray them. Yet, Richard fears nothing so much as what secrets his sword might reveal about his own soul. Falling in love would destroy them - for reasons Richard can't imagine and Kahlan dare not say. In their darkest hour, hunted relentlessly, tormented by treachery and loss, Kahlan calls upon Richard to reach beyond his sword - to invoke within himself something more noble. Neither knows that the rules of battle have just changed...or that their time has run out. Wizard's First Rule is the beginning. One book. One Rule. Witness the birth of a legend.

isbn.description: The ISBN of the book. Will be null if unknown.

asin.description: The ASIN of the book. Will be null if unknown.

language.description: The language of the book. Will be null if unknown.

explicit.description: Whether the book has been marked as explicit.

bookMetadataMinified.description: The minified metadata for a book in the database.

titleIgnorePrefix.description: The title of the book with any prefix moved to the end.

authorName.description: The name of the book's author(s).

authorNameLF.description: The name of the book's author(s) with last names first.

narratorName.description: The name of the audiobook's narrator(s).

seriesName.description: The name of the book's series.

bookCoverPath.description: The absolute path on the server of the cover file. Will be null if there is no cover.

durationSec.description: The total length (in seconds) of the item or file.

size.description: The total size (in bytes) of the item or file.

bookMinified.description: Minified book schema. Does not depend on `bookBase` because there's pretty much no overlap.

numTracks.description: The number of tracks the book's audio files have.

numAudioFiles.description: The number of audio files the book has.

numChapters.description: The number of chapters the book has.

numMissingParts.description: The total number of missing parts the book has.

numInvalidAudioFiles.description: The number of invalid audio files the book has.

ebookFormat.description: The format of ebook of the book. Will be null if the book is an audiobook.

mediaMinified.description: The minified media of the library item.

libraryItemMinified.description: A single item on the server, like a book or podcast. Minified media format.

authorSeries.description: Series and the included library items that an author has written.

items.description: The items in the series. Each library item's media's metadata will have a `series` attribute, a `Series Sequence`, which is the matching series.

author.description: An author object which includes a description and image path. The library items and series associated with the author are optionally included.

libraryItems.description: The items associated with the author

series.description: The series associated with the author

authorUpdated.description: Whether the author was updated without errors. Will not exist if author was merged.

authorMerged.description: Whether the author was merged with another author. Will not exist if author was updated.

imageWidth.description: The requested width of image in pixels.

imageHeight.description: The requested height of image in pixels. If `null`, the height is scaled to maintain aspect ratio based on the requested width.

imageRaw.description: Return the raw image without scaling if true.

imageUrl.description: The URL of the image to add to the server

authorSearchName.description: The name of the author to use for searching.

ereaderName.description: The name of the e-reader device.

EreaderDeviceObject.description: An e-reader device configured to receive EPUB through e-mail.

email.description: The email address associated with the e-reader device.

availabilityOption.description: The availability option for the device.

users.description: List of specific users allowed to access the device.

EmailSettings.description: The email settings configuration for the server. This includes the credentials to send e-books and an array of e-reader devices.

id.description: The unique identifier for the email settings. Currently this is always `email-settings`

port.description: The port number for the SMTP server.

secure.description: Indicates if the connection should use SSL/TLS.

rejectUnauthorized.description: Indicates if unauthorized SSL/TLS certificates should be rejected.

testAddress.description: The test email address used for sending test emails.

fromAddress.description: The default "from" email address for outgoing emails.

fullPath.description: The path on the server for the folder. (Read Only)

coverAspectRatio.description: Whether the library should use square book covers. Must be 0 (for false) or 1 (for true).

disableWatcher.description: Whether to disable the folder watcher for the library.

skipMatchingMediaWithAsin.description: Whether to skip matching books that already have an ASIN.

skipMatchingMediaWithIsbn.description: Whether to skip matching books that already have an ISBN.

autoScanCronExpression.description: The cron expression for when to automatically scan the library folders. If null, automatic scanning will be disabled.

audiobooksOnly.description: Whether the library should ignore ebook files and only allow ebook files to be supplementary.

hideSingleBookSeries.description: Whether to hide series with only one book.

onlyShowLaterBooksInContinueSeries.description: Whether to only show books in a series after the highest series sequence.

metadataPrecedence.description: The precedence of metadata sources. See Metadata Providers for a list of possible providers.

podcastSearchRegion.description: The region to use when searching for podcasts.

createdAt.description: The time (in ms since POSIX epoch) when was created.

library.description: A library object which includes either books or podcasts.

folders.description: The folders that belong to the library.

displayOrder.description: Display position of the library in the list of libraries. Must be >= 1.

icon.description: The selected icon for the library. See Library Icons for a list of possible icons.

mediaType.description: The type of media that the library contains. Will be `book` or `podcast`. (Read Only)

provider.description: Preferred metadata provider for the library. See Metadata Providers for a list of possible providers.

libraryFolders.description: The folders of the library. Only specify the fullPath.

libraryDisplayOrder.description: The display order of the library. Must be >= 1.

libraryIcon.description: The icon of the library. See Library Icons for a list of possible icons.

libraryMediaType.description: The type of media that the library contains. Must be `book` or `podcast`.

libraryProvider.description: Preferred metadata provider for the library. See Metadata Providers for a list of possible providers.

authorExpanded.description: The author schema with the total number of books in the library.

numBooks.description: The number of books associated with the author in the library.

total.description: The total number of items in the response.

limit.description: The number of items to return. If 0, no items are returned.

page.description: The page number (zero indexed) to return. If no limit is specified, then page will have no effect.

sortBy.description: The field to sort by from the request.

sortDesc.description: Whether to sort in descending order.

filterBy.description: The field to filter by from the request. TODO

collapseSeries.description: Whether collapse series was set in the request.

libraryInclude.description: The fields to include in the response. The only current option is `rssfeed`.

sequence.description: The position in the series the book is.

libraryItemSequence.description: A single item on the server, like a book or podcast. Includes series sequence information.

seriesBooks.description: A series object which includes the name and books in the series.

nameIgnorePrefix.description: The name of the series with any prefix moved to the end.

nameIgnorePrefixSort.description: The name of the series with any prefix removed.

books.description: The library items that contain the books in the series. A sequence attribute that denotes the position in the series the book is in, is tacked on.

totalDuration.description: The combined duration (in seconds) of all books in the series.

seriesDescription.description: A description for the series. Will be null if there is none.
seriesDescription.example: The Sword of Truth is a series of twenty one epic fantasy novels written by Terry Goodkind.

series.description: A series object which includes the name and description of the series.

seriesProgress.description: The user's progress of a series.

libraryItemIds.description: The IDs of the library items in the series.

libraryItemIdsFinished.description: The IDs of the library items in the series that are finished.

seriesWithProgressAndRSS.description: A series object which includes the name and progress of the series.

rssFeed.description: The RSS feed for the series.

name.description: The name of the notification event. The names and allowable values are defined at https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf/blob/master/server/utils/notifications.js

requiresLibrary.description: Whether the notification event depends on a library existing.

libraryMediaType.description: The type of media of the library the notification depends on existing. Will not exist if requiresLibrary is false.

description.description: The description of the notification event.

variables.description: The variables of the notification event that can be used in the notification templates.

title.description: The default title template for notifications using the notification event.

body.description: The default body template for notifications using the notification event.

testData.description: The keys of the testData object will match the list of variables. The values will be the data used when sending a test notification.

appriseApiUrl.description: The full URL where the Apprise API to use is located.

libraryIdNullable.description: The ID of the library. Applies to all libraries if `null`.

notificationEventName.description: The name of the event the notification will fire on.

urls.description: The Apprise URLs to use for the notification.

titleTemplate.description: The template for the notification title.

bodyTemplate.description: The template for the notification body.

lastFiredAt.description: The time (in ms since POSIX epoch) when the notification was last fired. Will be null if the notification has not fired.

lastAttemptFailed.description: Whether the last notification attempt failed.

numConsecutiveFailedAttempts.description: The number of consecutive times the notification has failed.

numTimesFired.description: The number of times the notification has fired.

maxFailedAttempts.description: The maximum number of times a notification fails before being disabled.

maxNotificationQueue.description: The maximum number of notifications in the notification queue before events are ignored.

appriseType.description: The type of Apprise that will be used. At the moment, only api is available.

notificationDelay.description: The time (in ms) between notification pushes.

podcastId.description: The ID of podcasts and podcast episodes after 2.3.0.

releaseDate.description: The release date of the podcast.

feedUrl.description: The URL of the podcast feed.

imageUrl.description: The URL of the podcast's image.

itunesPageUrl.description: The URL of the podcast's iTunes page.

itunesId.description: The iTunes ID of the podcast.

itunesArtistId.description: The iTunes artist ID of the podcast.

explicit.description: Whether the podcast contains explicit content.

type.description: The type of podcast (e.g., episodic, serial).

oldPodcastId.description: The ID of podcasts on server version 2.2.23 and before.

fileMetadata.description: The metadata for a file, including the path, size, and unix timestamps of the file.

ext.description: The file extension of the file.

path.description: The absolute path on the server of the file.
path.example: /audiobooks/Terry Goodkind/Sword of Truth/Wizards First Rule/Terry Goodkind - SOT Bk01 - Wizards First Rule 01.mp3

relPath.description: The path of the file, relative to the book's or podcast's folder.

mtimeMs.description: The time (in ms since POSIX epoch) when the file was last modified on disk.

ctimeMs.description: The time (in ms since POSIX epoch) when the file status was changed on disk.

birthtimeMs.description: The time (in ms since POSIX epoch) when the file was created on disk. Will be 0 if unknown.

bookChapter.description: A book chapter. Includes the title and timestamps.

id.description: The ID of the book chapter.

start.description: When in the book (in seconds) the chapter starts.

end.description: When in the book (in seconds) the chapter ends.

audioMetaTags.description: ID3 metadata tags pulled from the audio file on import. Only non-null tags will be returned in requests.

audioFile.description: An audio file for a book. Includes audio metadata and track numbers.

index.description: The index of the audio file.

trackNumFromMeta.description: The track number of the audio file as pulled from the file's metadata. Will be null if unknown.

discNumFromMeta.description: The disc number of the audio file as pulled from the file's metadata. Will be null if unknown.

trackNumFromFilename.description: The track number of the audio file as determined from the file's name. Will be null if unknown.

discNumFromFilename.description: The disc number of the audio file as determined from the file's name. Will be null if unknown.

manuallyVerified.description: Whether the audio file has been manually verified by a user.

invalid.description: Whether the audio file is missing from the server.

exclude.description: Whether the audio file has been marked for exclusion.

error.description: Any error with the audio file. Will be null if there is none.

format.description: The format of the audio file.

bitRate.description: The bit rate (in bit/s) of the audio file.

language.description: The language of the audio file.

codec.description: The codec of the audio file.

timeBase.description: The time base of the audio file.

channels.description: The number of channels the audio file has.

channelLayout.description: The layout of the audio file's channels.

chapters.description: If the audio file is part of an audiobook, the chapters the file contains.

embeddedCoverArt.description: The type of embedded cover art in the audio file. Will be null if none exists.

mimeType.description: The MIME type of the audio file.

AudioTrack.description: Represents an audio track with various properties.

index.description: The index of the audio track.

startOffset.description: The start offset of the audio track in seconds.

duration.description: The duration of the audio track in seconds.

title.description: The title of the audio track.

contentUrl.description: The URL where the audio track content is located.

mimeType.description: The MIME type of the audio track.

codec.description: The codec used for the audio track.

PodcastEpisode.description: A single episode of a podcast.

index.description: The index of the episode within the podcast.

season.description: The season number of the episode.

episode.description: The episode number within the season.

episodeType.description: The type of episode (e.g., full, trailer).

enclosure.description: The enclosure object containing additional episode data.

guid.description: The globally unique identifier for the episode.

pubDate.description: The publication date of the episode.

coverPath.description: The file path to the podcast's cover image.

tags.description: The tags associated with the podcast.

autoDownloadSchedule.description: The schedule for automatic episode downloads, in cron format.

lastEpisodeCheck.description: The timestamp of the last episode check.

maxEpisodesToKeep.description: The maximum number of episodes to keep.

maxNewEpisodesToDownload.description: The maximum number of new episodes to download when automatically downloading epsiodes.

lastCoverSearch.description: The timestamp of the last cover search.

lastCoverSearchQuery.description: The query used for the last cover search.

size.description: The total size of all episodes in bytes.

duration.description: The total duration of all episodes in seconds.

numTracks.description: The number of tracks (episodes) in the podcast.

latestEpisodePublished.description: The timestamp of the most recently published episode.

notification404.description: An admin user is required or notification with the given ID not found.

limit.name: limit
limit.description: The number of items to return. This the size of a single page for the optional `page` query.

page.name: page
page.description: The page number (zero indexed) to return. If no limit is specified, then page will have no effect.

desc.name: desc
desc.description: Return items in reversed order if true.
